name: Harold MV
description:
Disclaimer - This game:

  1. has instances of flashing lights/patterns;
  2. contains elements of religious themes; and 
  3. is a work of fiction - any similarities to figures or events in real life is purely coincidental;
  4. is a work of satire. The developer has no issues whatsoever with RPGMaker VXAce or MZ. All plots lines are for dramatic purposes only!

June 2020, three months prior to the release of RPGMaker MZ - everyone's beloved hero, Harold, is on one final mission with his friends before retirement. However, anxiety of a remote retired life (away from the lifestyle he's grown accustomed to) weighs heavy on his mind - so much so that he is distracted, and gets gassed in the face during the final boss encounter! Suffering the after-effects of the gassing, Harold awakens as three aspects of himself, in an unknown location called the Dead End, in a pickle of his own making. Join Harold as he attempts to find a way out of his predicament, and a way back to his friends. 

So absorbed in his fear of losing some things, Harold now finds himself in a position where he could lose everything! 

Gameplay features:

  • A narrative mini-epic spanning 7 chapters (inclusive of prologue and epilogue) told over the course of a little over an hour*. Join the three aspects of Harold as they journey across the realm known as "Dead End" in hopes of finding a way out, and becoming whole again. *Developer completion time!
  • Carefully crafted cutscenes with specific timing for maximum impact! Join the aspects of Harold as they fight, scream, and claw their way out of the Dead End via a variety of insane manoeuvres!
  • Featuring a mix of amazing tracks from the brilliant Northsound Inc., ayato sound create, and YouFulca - providing an amazingly immersive experience!
  • The ABCs of combat Mk.II! Simple, yet powerful combat system centred around "Seal, Reveal, and Heal" combo-based skills. Seal deadly enemy AoE attacks, strip them of their defences, and heal whenever the need arises. Utilize and master this system on a host of enemies and dangerous bosses!
  • Punbelievable enemies (Wait, don't leave! Sni-deja vu?). Encounter a mix of original and RTP edited chimeras whose designs are mostly based on puns!

For those looking for the Harold Jam 2022 required elements (non-spoilers):

  1. Harold: the main character in the whole or aspects form;
  2. "What have you done, Harold?": at the end of Chapter 5, post-boss-fight - the boss says this;
  3. "Dead End": Starting location of Chapter 1. Technically Chapters 1 - 4 all take place there too.

What's in the download archive ("den399_HaroldMV.7z"):

  1. "HaroldMV_GAME.exe" application;
  2. "www" save folder;
  3. "HaroldMV_CREDITS.pdf" a text document containing detailed credits of all resources that helped in the making of the game.
